Pre-Game Insights: Match 21 of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup, 2024, has South Africa taking on Bangladesh at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York, on June 10 at 08:00 PM IST.
South Africa have played 2 matches and will be looking to strengthen their hold of the top spot, while Bangladesh have played 1 match in the series and they are ranked second on the points table.

In the last match played by South Africa against the Netherlands, South Africa beat the Netherlands by 4 wickets. The top fantasy player for South Africa was Ottneil Baartman who scored 118 fantasy points.
In their last match in this series against Sri Lanka, Bangladesh beat Sri Lanka by 2 wickets. The top fantasy player for Bangladesh was Mustafizur Rahman who scored 97 fantasy points.

The pitch at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York, is balanced. The average first-innings score at this venue in the last 5 matches is 108 runs. The team batting first at this venue has won 40% of its matches.
The temperature will hover around 20°C with 41% humidity. Winds at a speed of 4.78 m/s are expected.
The pacers have been very successful at this venue. They have taken 80% of the total wickets at this venue.

In the 8 matches played between these 2 teams, Bangladesh has lost all their matches. Bangladesh do not have a good record against South Africa. Based on our analysis and trends, we predict the trend to continue.
